column3: na okohun ɔbaa huhunyi bi wɔ hɔ
Samson aba ha. Na wotwaa no ho hyiae

column3: ɔdɔɔ ɔbaa bi wɔ Sorek ɔbɔn mu a ne dzin dze Delila."

column2: "Na Filistiafo ekunyin no fowee baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Daadaa no
column4: na hwɛ adze kor a n’ahoɔdzen kɛse no wɔ mu
column5: na ɔkwan kor a yɛnam mu bɛhyɛ no do
column6: ma yaakyekyer no ahyɛ no amen: na ankor ankor nyinara yɛbɛma wo ndwetɛbona ɔhadubiako."

column3: Meserɛ wo
column4: ka adze kor a w’ahoɔdzen kɛse no wɔ mu
column5: na adze kor a wɔdze bɛkyekyer wo ahyɛ wo amen kyerɛ me."

column3: Sɛ wɔdze mpaahoma momon esuon a ɔnnwoe kyekyer me a
column5: na mayɛ dɛ nyimpa biara so."

column2: "Nna Filistiafo ekunyin no dze mpaahoma momon a ɔnnwowee esuon brɛɛ ɔbaa no
column3: na ɔdze kyekyeer no."

column2: "Afei nna ɔwɔ atsɛweefo hyɛ adankyir. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Samson
column4: Filistiafo reba wo do oo. Na ɔtsetseew mpaahoma no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ asaabahoma sɛ ɔka gya a ɔtsetsew no. Dɛm ntsi woennhu n’ahoɔdzen no."

column3: Hwɛ
column5: na aka akɔhwisɛm akyerɛ me: afei meserɛ wo
column6: ka dza wɔdze kyekyer wo a ɔbɛyɛ yie kyerɛ me."

column3: Sɛ wɔdze ntampehoma fofor ara a wɔmmfaa nnyɛɛ edwuma pɛn kyekyer me a
column5: na mayɛ dɛ nyimpa biara so."

column3: na ɔdze kyekyeer no

column6: Filistiafo reba wo do oo. Nna atsɛweefo no hyɛ adankyir. Na ɔtsetseew no wɔ n’abasa ho dɛ asaabahoma bi."

column3: Esi me atwetwe ebodu ndɛ da yi
column4: na aka akɔhwisɛm akyerɛ me: ka dza wɔdze kyekyer wo a ɔbɛyɛ yie kyerɛ me. Na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: Sɛ edze me tsir mpɛsɛw esuon no fora ɔtanwendze no wen a."

column3: na ɔsee no dɛ

column6: na otuu dza wɔawen no mu dadzeba no

column3: Ebɛyɛ dɛn ase dɛ modɔ wo
column4: wɔ aber a w’akoma nnyi mo ho yi? Esi me atwetwe mprɛnsa nye yi
column5: na ennkaa adze kor a w’ahoɔdzen kɛse yi wɔ mu no nnkyerɛɛ me."

column3: aber a ɔbaa no dze ne nsɛm guaan no ho daa daa
column5: ɔyɛɛ Samson ne kra ahomtsew dze kɔr owu mu."

column2: "Na ɔkaa n’akoma mu asɛm nyinara kyerɛɛ no
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Oyindam ano nnkaa me tsir da; osiandɛ mifi me na yamu araa na mayɛ (Nazirinyi) nyia ɔakam noho ama Nyankopɔn: sɛ woyi me tsir a
column5: nna m’ahoɔdzen no befi mo ho
column7: na mayɛ dɛ nyimpa biara so."

column2: "Na aber a Delila hun dɛ ɔaka n’akoma mu asɛm nyinara akyerɛ no no
column3: ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛfrɛɛ Filistiafo ekunyin no
column5: Hom mbra prɛko yi ara
column6: na ɔaka n’akoma mu asɛm nyinara akyerɛ me. Nna Filistiafo ekunyin no baa ne nkyɛn
column7: na wɔdzedze sika no wɔ hɔn nsamu bae."

column2: "Na Delila maa ɔdaa n’anankoroma do; na ɔfrɛɛ ɔbanyin bi ma obeyii ne tsir mpɛsɛw esuon no na ɔhyɛɛ ase hyɛɛ no amen
column3: na n’ahoɔdzen no fii no ho kɔree."
Samson
column4: Filistiafo reba wo do oo. Na ofii ne nda no mu nyanee
column5: na ɔsee dɛ
column7: na mawosow moho. Naaso nna ɔnodze onnyim dɛ EWURADZE efi ne nkyɛn kɔ."

column3: na wotutuu n’enyiwa: na wɔdze no baa Gaza
column4: na wɔdze boran mpokyerɛ too no; na ɔyaam ewu wɔ adaduafo fi no mu."

column3: annkyɛr pii na ne tsinhwi no hyɛɛ ase fuuw bio."

column2: "Na Filistiafo ekunyin no poon hɔnho hyiae dɛ wɔrobɔbɔ afɔr kɛse ama hɔn nyame Dagon
column3: na wɔagye hɔn enyi: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Hɛn nyame dze hɛn tamfo Samson ahyɛ hɛn nsa."

column2: "Na aber a ɔman no hun no no
column3: woyii hɔn nyame ayɛw: na wɔsee dɛ
column5: na hɛn man ne sɛɛfo a oekuku hɛn mu piigyan no

column3: aber a hɔn akoma tɔɔ hɔn yamu no
column5: Wɔnkɛfrɛ Samson ma yɛngor no ho. Na wɔkɛfrɛɛ Samson wɔ adaduafo fi no mu bae; na wɔgoor no ho: na wɔdze no gyinaa edum no ntamu."

column2: "Na Samson see abofra no a ɔdze ne nsamu no dɛ
column3: Gyaa me ma munsusuo edum no a ɔdan no si do no mu

column2: "Afei nna dan no mbanyin na mbaa ahyɛ mu ma; na Filistiafo ekunyin no nyinara wɔ hɔ; na nyimpa bɛyɛ mpemebiasa wɔ dan no etsifi a wɔrohwɛ Samson a woridzi no ho fɛw no no."

column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn
column5: kaa me
column10: ma mindzi m’enyiwa ebien yi ho wer prɛko wɔ Filistiafo no do."

column2: "Na Samson susuoo finimfin edum ebien no a dan no si do no mu
column3: na ɔtweree
column4: ne nsa enyimfa dze kor mu
column5: na n’abankum dze kor so mu."

column3: Ma menye Filistiafo no nwu. Na ɔdze n’ahoɔdzen nyinara bɔɔ no mu adze; na dan no bui guu ekunyin na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu no nyinara do. Dɛm ntsi ewufo a okum hɔn wɔ no wu mu no dɔɔ so sen hɔn a okum hɔn wɔ no nkwaber mu."

column2: "Nna no nuanom na n’egya fie nyinara sii mu kɔree kɛfaa no
column3: na wɔdze no fowee bae besiee no wɔ Zora na Estaol ntamu wɔ n’egya Manoa n’esiei. Na Samson dzii Israel enyim mfe eduonu."
